languages.text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} but gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it receives any damage.

An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it receives any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 激怒一位盟友恶魔，使其失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。每当该恶魔受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 激怒一位盟友恶魔，使其失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。每当该恶魔受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

languages.text: Союзный демон впадает в ярость. Он теряет всю свою {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, но при каждом получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Союзный демон впадает в ярость. Он теряет всю свою {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g}, но при каждом получении урона получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.
Союзный демон впадает в ярость. Он теряет всю свою {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g}, но при каждом получении урона получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.

languages.text: 味方のディーモンは激怒し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}をすべて失うが、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 味方のディーモンは激怒し、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を全て失うが、ダメージを受けるたびに追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Un daemon aliado se enfurece y pierde toda su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, pero gana un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un daemon aliado se enfurece y pierde toda su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, pero obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: Ein verbündeter Dämon wird wütend und verliert seine gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, erhält aber einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, wenn er {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet.
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein verbündeter Dämon wird wütend und verliert seine gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}, aber erhält jedes mal, wenn er Schaden nimmt, einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

Ein verbündeter Dämon wird wütend und verliert seine gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, aber erhält jedes mal, wenn er {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} nimmt, einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

languages.text: Pris d'un accès de rage, un démon allié perd tous ses points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, mais bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire chaque fois qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pris d'un accès de rage, un démon allié perd tous ses points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, mais bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire chaque fois qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.

Pris d'un accès de rage, un démon allié perd tous ses points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, mais bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire chaque fois qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: Dost bir iblis, öfkelenir ve tüm {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerini kaybeder ancak her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında bir ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: An ally daemon becomes enraged and loses all its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} each time it suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
